summary: Arthur Hendrick Vandenberg  was an American politician.
full_text: Arthur Hendrick Vandenberg  was a Republican Senator from the U.S. state of Michigan who participated in the creation of the United Nations. He is best known for leading the Republican Party from a foreign policy of isolationism to one of internationalism, and supporting the Cold War, the Truman Doctrine, the Marshall Plan, and NATO.
title: Arthur Vandenberg
